definition: imprecise quantities but fairly close to correct, on the move
details:
adverb
- imprecise quantities but fairly close to correct
= example: imprecise quantities but fairly close to correct
= synonyms: close to, just about, some, roughly, more or less, around, or so, approximately
- in the area or vicinity
= example: in the area or vicinity
= synonyms: around
- all around or on all sides
= example: all around or on all sides
= synonyms: around
- in or to a reversed position or direction
= example: in or to a reversed position or direction
= synonyms: around
- used of movement to or among many different places or in no particular direction
= example: used of movement to or among many different places or in no particular direction
= synonyms: around
- (of actions or states) slightly short of or not quite accomplished
= synonyms: almost, most, nearly, near, nigh, well-nigh
- in rotation or succession
= example: in rotation or succession
adjective
- on the move
= synonyms: astir
